metadata.title: CVE-2022-47516 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the libsofia-sip fork in drachtio-server before0.8.20. It allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (daemoncrash) via a crafted UDP message that leads to a failure of thelibsofia-sip-ua/tport/tport.c self assertion.

criterions.comment: sofia-sip: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
